entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of light snow. Low minus 29. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy with 30 percent chance of light snow. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 29. Wind chill minus 31 this evening and minus 36 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 8:45 PM EDT Tuesday 14 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 18.
